casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy REID 105P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Jimmy Reid, for Reid, Jimmy. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of March 2017 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal: "Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017." Ervin, J. recused
